answerText: Poland [or the Republic of Poland; or Polska][10] This other Polish author wrote a work narrated by Jozef about Jozef's superhuman merchant father in The Street of Crocodiles and also wrote Sanatorium Under the Sign of the Hourglass.
heading: Penn Bowl |2013 | 14 | 4 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This country is home to the author of a work in which Professor Pimko asks questions of Johnie who returns to adolescence. [10] Name this home country of the authors of Ferdydurke and a novel about Marcus Vinicius subtitled "A Narrative of the Time of Nero."
